articles.description: Head coach Brendon McCullum told England they were “too nice” before the tetchy third Test against India, according to batter Harry Brook.

articles.description: England manager Sarina Wiegman says her players decided to stop taking the knee before matches because the impact of the anti-racism gesture is "not good enough".

articles.description: President Donald Trump threatens to block Washington Commanders' new stadium build if the team does not revert to their original name.
